lyrics.text: We were both young when I first saw you
lyrics.translation: 第一次见面时 我们都很年少

lyrics.text: I close my eyes and the flashback starts
lyrics.translation: 我闭上双眼 回忆开始浮现

lyrics.text: I'm standing there
lyrics.translation: 我站在那里

lyrics.text: On a balcony in summer air
lyrics.translation: 在阳台上 沐浴着夏日微风

lyrics.text: See the lights, see the party, the ball gowns
lyrics.translation: 我看见灯光 看见派对和舞会礼服

lyrics.text: See you make your way through the crowd and say, "Hello"
lyrics.translation: 我看见你穿过人群 向我走来 然后说 “你好”

lyrics.text: Little did I know
lyrics.translation: 当时的我还不知道

lyrics.text: That you were Romeo, you were throwing pebbles
lyrics.translation: 你就是罗密欧 那个扔石子的人

lyrics.text: And my daddy said, "Stay away from Juliet"
lyrics.translation: 而我的父亲说 “离朱丽叶远点”

lyrics.text: And I was crying on the staircase, begging you, "Please, don't go"
lyrics.translation: 我在楼梯上哭泣 乞求着你 “拜托 不要走”

lyrics.text: And I said, "Romeo, take me somewhere we can be alone
lyrics.translation: 然后我说 “罗密欧 带我去一个不会被打扰的地方

lyrics.text: I'll be waiting, all there's left to do is run"
lyrics.translation: 我会等你 我们只能逃跑”

lyrics.text: You'll be the prince and I'll be the princess
lyrics.translation: 你来当王子 我来当公主

lyrics.text: It's a love story, baby, just say, "Yes"
lyrics.translation: 这是一个爱情故事 宝贝 你只需要说 “我愿意”

lyrics.text: So I sneak out to the garden to see you
lyrics.translation: 我偷偷溜了出去 与你在花园见面

lyrics.text: We keep quiet 'cause we're dead if they knew
lyrics.translation: 我们不敢闹出动静 因为如果被发现 我们就完蛋了

lyrics.text: So close your eyes
lyrics.translation: 所以闭上你的眼睛

lyrics.text: Escape this town for a little while
lyrics.translation: 暂时逃离这个小镇

lyrics.text: Oh-oh, 'cause you were Romeo, I was a scarlet letter
lyrics.translation: 哦哦 因为你是罗密欧 而我背负着条条框框

lyrics.text: And my daddy said, "Stay away from Juliet"
lyrics.translation: 而我的父亲说 “离朱丽叶远点”

lyrics.text: But you were everything to me, I was begging you, "Please, don't go"
lyrics.translation: 但对我而言 你就是全部 我乞求着你 “拜托 不要走”

lyrics.text: And I said, "Romeo, take me somewhere we can be alone
lyrics.translation: 然后我说 “罗密欧 带我去一个不会被打扰的地方

lyrics.text: I'll be waiting, all there's left to do is run"
lyrics.translation: 我会等你 我们只能逃跑”

lyrics.text: You'll be the prince and I'll be the princess
lyrics.translation: 你来当王子 我来当公主

lyrics.text: It's a love story, baby, just say, "Yes"
lyrics.translation: 这是一个爱情故事 宝贝 你只需要说 “我愿意”

lyrics.text: "Romeo, save me, they're trying to tell me how to feel
lyrics.translation: “罗密欧 救救我吧 他们在试图左右我的感情

lyrics.text: This love is difficult, but it's real
lyrics.translation: 这段感情虽然艰难 但它无比真实

lyrics.text: Don't be afraid, we'll make it out of this mess"
lyrics.translation: 别害怕 我们一定会度过这道难关”

lyrics.text: It's a love story, baby, just say, "Yes"
lyrics.translation: 这是一个爱情故事 宝贝 你只需要说 “我愿意”

lyrics.text: Oh-oh
lyrics.translation: 哦哦

lyrics.text: But I got tired of waiting
lyrics.translation: 但我厌倦了等待

lyrics.text: Wondering if you were ever coming around
lyrics.translation: 不知道你是否会来到我身边

lyrics.text: My faith in you was fading
lyrics.translation: 我渐渐失去对你的信任

lyrics.text: When I met you on the outskirts of town
lyrics.translation: 当我在小镇的郊外遇到你时

lyrics.text: And I said, "Romeo, save me, I've been feeling so alone
lyrics.translation: 我说 “罗密欧 救救我吧 我感觉好孤独

lyrics.text: I keep waiting for you, but you never come
lyrics.translation: 我一直在等你 但你从未出现

lyrics.text: Is this in my head? I don't know what to think"
lyrics.translation: 一切只是我的幻想吗 我不知道该怎么想”

lyrics.text: He knelt to the ground and pulled out a ring, and said
lyrics.translation: 他跪在地上 掏出一枚戒指 说

lyrics.text: "Marry me, Juliet, you'll never have to be alone
lyrics.translation: “嫁给我吧 朱丽叶 你再也不会孤独了

lyrics.text: I love you and that's all I really know
lyrics.translation: 我爱你 这是我无比确信的事

lyrics.text: I talked to your dad, go pick out a white dress
lyrics.translation: 我和你爸爸谈过了 快去挑一件白色婚纱吧

lyrics.text: It's a love story, baby, just say, 'yes'"
lyrics.translation: 这是一个爱情故事 宝贝 你只需要说 ‘我愿意’”

lyrics.text: Oh-oh-oh
lyrics.translation: 哦哦哦

lyrics.text: Oh-oh-oh, oh
lyrics.translation: 哦哦哦 哦

lyrics.text: 'Cause we were both young when I first saw you
lyrics.translation: 因为第一次见面时 我们都很年少
